project.description: Perform a rolling deploy for a given fleet TEMPLATE unit.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: FLEET_UNIT
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Name of the fleet unit as it appears in ${HOST_SCRIPT_DIR}. Does NOT require the ".service" extension.

hudson.model.ChoiceParameterDefinition.name: FLEET_DIR
hudson.model.ChoiceParameterDefinition.description: Director where template unit file is located.

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash if [ -z $FLEET_UNIT ] || [ $FLEET_UNIT = "" ]; then echo 'FLEET_UNIT not provided.' exit 1 fi eval ${SETUPKEYS}
# update scripts before submitting again echo "---- updating scripts ----" eval "${SSHCMD} 'fleetctl destroy update-scripts || :'" while [ "$(eval "${SSHCMD} 'fleetctl list-units|grep update-scripts'")" != "" ]; do sleep 1; done eval "${SSHCMD} 'fleetctl submit ${HOST_SCRIPT_DIR}/util-units/update-scripts.service'" eval "${SSHCMD} 'fleetctl start update-scripts'" echo "--------> submitted script update request to cluster..." while [ "$(eval "${SSHCMD} 'fleetctl list-units|grep update-scripts|cut -s -f5|uniq'")" != "inactive" ] do sleep 1 done
# ensure that unit file exists echo "---- verifying unit file" eval "${SSHCMD} 'cat ${HOST_SCRIPT_DIR}/${FLEET_DIR}/${FLEET_UNIT}\\@.service'" if [ ! $? -eq 0 ]; then exit 1; fi
# destroy old template echo "---- destroying old ${FLEET_UNIT}@.service ----" (eval "${SSHCMD} 'fleetctl list-unit-files|grep ${FLEET_UNIT}@.service'" 2&>/dev/null) || : eval "${SSHCMD} 'fleetctl destroy ${FLEET_UNIT}@.service'"
# submit newly updated template echo "---- submitting new ${HOST_SCRIPT_DIR}/fleet-manual/${FLEET_UNIT}@.service ----" eval "${SSHCMD} 'fleetctl submit ${HOST_SCRIPT_DIR}/${FLEET_DIR}/${FLEET_UNIT}\\@.service'"
# restart templated units one at a time for unit in $(eval "${SSHCMD} 'fleetctl list-units|grep ${FLEET_UNIT}@|tr -s [:space:]|cut -f1 -s'"); do echo "---- redeploying ${unit} ----" echo "Destroying ${unit}" eval "${SSHCMD} 'fleetctl destroy ${unit}'" while [ "$(eval "${SSHCMD} 'fleetctl list-units|grep ${unit}'")" != "" ]; do sleep 1; done
echo "Restarting ${unit}" eval "${SSHCMD} 'fleetctl start ${unit}'" while [ "$(eval "${SSHCMD} 'fleetctl list-units|grep ${unit}|tr -s [:space:]|cut -s -f3'")" != "active" ] do sleep 1 done done
